thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 08 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Kanglongda Special Protection Technology sees FY 2017 net profit down 6 pct to 16 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Kanglongda Special Protection Technology sees FY 2017 net profit down 6 pct to 16 pct

organizations.name: zhejiang kanglongda special protection technology co ltd

text:
Jan 8(Reuters) - Zhejiang Kanglongda Special Protection Technology Co Ltd
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to decrease by 6 percent to 16 percent, or to be 79 million yuan to 88 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 93.8 million yuan
* Says increased R&D costs, price rise in original auxiliary materials and exchange losses are the main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/z15dDc
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
